医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究发现，免疫细胞三联体是癌症免疫治疗成功的关键当今的癌症免疫疗法有一个令人沮丧的事实。虽然有时它们工作得很漂亮-；完全消除或大大减少特定患者的癌症——；其他时候它们根本不起作用。这是一个谜。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Triad-of-immune-cells-key-to-successful-cancer-immunotherapy-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Triad-of-immune-cells-key-to-successful-cancer-immunotherapy-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=59f289a6-2e73-43cb-85bc-899830464c78 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 22:30:38 -0400 Triad of immune cells key to successful cancer immunotherapy, study finds
美国人在 COVID-19 封锁期间吃的食物更健康、更多样化宾夕法尼亚州立大学研究人员领导的一项新研究表明，在 COVID-19 大流行开始后的几个月里，美国人的饮食可能变得更健康、更多样化。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Americans-ate-healthier-and-more-diverse-foods-during-COVID-19-lockdowns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Americans-ate-healthier-and-more-diverse-foods-during-COVID-19-lockdowns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a64d1480-b6b5-4166-9796-5cdf95ade988 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 22:20:50 -0400 Americans ate healthier and more diverse foods during COVID-19 lockdowns
研究发现，大多数沙门氏菌病例中很少有鸡肉产品生禽肉是沙门氏菌中毒的主要原因之一，每年影响美国数千人。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Few-chicken-products-account-for-most-salmonella-cases-study-finds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Few-chicken-products-account-for-most-salmonella-cases-study-finds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f053ea05-5216-4c3a-a9f8-566ab85cb4bf Mon, 15 Jul 2024 21:29:38 -0400 Few chicken products account for most salmonella cases, study finds
新研究揭示中风生存率持续存在的种族差距辛辛那提大学 7 月 15 日在美国神经病学学会医学杂志《神经病学》在线发表的研究表明，中风后的总体长期生存率正在改善，但与白人相比，黑人的长期预后较差。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/New-research-reveals-persistent-racial-gap-in-中风-survival-rates.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/New-research-reveals-persistent-racial-gap-in-中风-survival-rates.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d20db6fe-dc2a-4eb8-9e7c-9a5d4b0075ee Mon, 15 Jul 2024 21:24:02 -0400 New research reveals persistent racial gap in stroke survival rates
大麻醇有望减少焦虑和增强记忆力且无副作用华盛顿州立大学的研究人员发现，大麻酚 (CBG) 可以减轻焦虑并改善言语记忆，而不会导致健康成年人中毒或损伤。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Cannabigerol-shows-promise-in-reducing-anxiety-and-enhancing-memory-without-side-effects.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Cannabigerol-shows-promise-in-reducing-anxiety-and-enhancing-memory-without-side-effects.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=22eb65fd-1ab0-474d-b8fe-a283b768875d Mon, 15 Jul 2024 20:06:00 -0400 Cannabigerol shows promise in reducing anxiety and enhancing memory without side effects
SH2B1基因通过室旁下丘脑防御肥胖肥胖是一种复杂的疾病，由遗传、食物环境、行为和其他因素共同引起。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/SH2B1-gene-defends-against-obesity-via-the-para心室-下丘脑.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/SH2B1-gene-defends-against-obesity-via-the-para心室-下丘脑.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=15c1148e-dd27-4436-97d0-044e248dbc58 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 15:38:47 -0400 SH2B1 gene defends against obesity via the paraventricular hypothalamus
美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 拨款支持在毁灭性中风后进行认知筛查的进展田纳西大学健康科学中心护理学院研究副院长获得美国国立卫生研究院 (NIH) 为期两年、价值 421,188 美元的资助，用于改善患有动脉瘤性中风的破坏性中风患者的认知筛查蛛网膜下腔出血（aSAH）。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/NIH-grant-supports-advancement-in-cognitive-screening-after-devastating-type-of-中风.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/NIH-grant-supports-advancement-in-cognitive-screening-after-devastating-type-of-中风.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1b6fe005-04ae-4231-b4e0-135e3bd5dc97 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 15:29:47 -0400 NIH grant supports advancement in cognitive screening after devastating type of stroke
遗传标记预测加巴喷丁对慢性盆腔疼痛的反应研究表明，携带特定形式疼痛基因的女性更有可能对用于治疗长期不适的常见药物产生良好反应。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Genetic-marker-predicts-gabapentin-response-in-chronic-pelvic-pain.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Genetic-marker-predicts-gabapentin-response-in-chronic-pelvic-pain.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d1719ae6-aff8-4dae-81f6-dc48d18688b6 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 15:22:33 -0400 Genetic marker predicts gabapentin response in chronic pelvic pain
研究揭示抑郁症患者的神经特征发生改变正如父母、老师和宠物主人可以证明的那样，奖励在塑造人类和动物的行为方面发挥着巨大作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Study-reveals-altered-neural-signature-in-病人-with-depression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/Study-reveals-altered-neural-signature-in-病人-with-depression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=af55dcc0-d53a-4174-a183-d67ccc519d8a Mon, 15 Jul 2024 15:17:17 -0400 Study reveals altered neural signature in patients with depression
ARPA-H 资助推动 Wyss 研究所的 RNA 治疗项目哈佛大学 Wyss 生物启发工程研究所的一个合作研究项目获得了健康高级研究计划局 (ARPA-H) 高达 2700 万美元的资助，将推进一种与疾病无关的新型 RNA 疗法，该疗法有潜力治疗多种疾病，并可有效、快速部署。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/ARPA-H-funding-boosts-Wyss-Institutes-RNA-therapeutic-project.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240715/ARPA-H-funding-boosts-Wyss-Institutes-RNA-therapeutic-project.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=1fc7d932-b08c-4e07-8ef6-279112387058 Mon, 15 Jul 2024 15:11:17 -0400 ARPA-H funding boosts Wyss Institute's RNA therapeutic project
